## Description
Describe the feature and why it is needed.

## Scope
- What this feature includes
- What this feature does NOT include

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement core logic
- [ ] Add validation
- [ ] Add error handling
- [ ] Add audit events (if applicable)
- [ ] Add/update tests
- [ ] Update documentation

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Feature behaves as described
- [ ] All edge cases handled
- [ ] Tests pass
- [ ] No security regressions introduced

## Notes
Any extra context, screenshots, or references.
